Name: Oppaidius Desert Island!
About the game: THE EPIC CONCLUSION! After a dramatic shipwreck, you end up on a island with Angela, an incredible girl! Now you two are stuck together on a desert island! What will happen...? - No censorship! - Gorgeous art by Vittorio Giorgi, with more than 200 hand-drawn animation frames - Legendary composer Keiji Yamagishi (Ninja Gaiden, Captain Tsubasa series, Streets Of Rage 4) joins the game with an original track! - A detailed story with more than 33K words, spanning several different endings! - More than 140 'jiggle breast physics' hand-drawn frames! Is this a new World Record for a video game...?!? - Japanese guest musicians! Masashi Kageyama from Gimmick! and Tsuyoshi Kaneko of Yakuza saga and SEGAGAGA fame! - A new mysterious girl to interact with...? - Sizlla Okamura, the composer of the NeoGeo cult classic Viewpoint , produced an exclusive remix track for the game! - A fun set of Steam achievements to pursue! - An awesome 'Oppaidius Xtreme Beach Volley' RPG style minigame! - Original music score done with an FM-synth chip (Yamaha YM2151) by Luca Della Regina (Xydonia, Steel Assault) - Pixel art backgrounds with native resolutions and color palette from retro-consoles - Steam page header image art by JoÃ«l Jurion!
